casebody.data:
2002-1541 (La. 10/14/02)

Robert H. FEASTER, et al. v. RELIANT ENERGY GAS TRANSMISSION COMPANY, INC. et al. No. 2002-CC-1541. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Environmental Quality Dept, of.; Givens, J. Dale; Levy, Linda; Casanova, Keith; Louisiana State of; — Defendant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Caddo, 1st Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 460-916; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. CW 02-36250.

Denied.

VICTORY, J., recused.
